long_description: Flexing the legendary muscle of the original Pelican Case, this mini case provides armor against the brute forces of nature. Sized for a large cell phone, camera, PDA, game-player, pager, radio or similarly items; interior space measures 8.4 x 4.4 x 2.25 in. Offering reliable protection to your valuables, this case is water-resistant, crushproof and has an automatic pressure purge valve. Case liner protects objects from bumps and jolts. Exterior features a carabiner clip and strap attachment point. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: Flexing the legendary muscle of the original Pelican Case, this mini case provides armor against the brute forces of nature.
